Urho3D::Object Class Referenceabstract

Base class for objects with type identification, subsystem access and event sending/receiving capability. More...

#include <Urho3D/Core/Object.h>

Inherits Urho3D::RefCounted.

Inherited by Urho3D::Application, Urho3D::Audio, Urho3D::Connection, Urho3D::Console, Urho3D::ConstantBuffer, Urho3D::Database, Urho3D::DbConnection, Urho3D::DbConnection, Urho3D::DebugHud, Urho3D::Engine, Urho3D::File, Urho3D::FileSelector, Urho3D::FileSystem, Urho3D::FileWatcher, Urho3D::FreeTypeLibrary, Urho3D::Geometry, Urho3D::Graphics, Urho3D::IndexBuffer, Urho3D::Input, Urho3D::Localization, Urho3D::Log, Urho3D::LuaScript, Urho3D::LuaScriptEventInvoker, Urho3D::MessageBox, Urho3D::NamedPipe, Urho3D::Network, Urho3D::OcclusionBuffer, Urho3D::PackageFile, Urho3D::Profiler, Urho3D::Renderer, Urho3D::Resource, Urho3D::ResourceCache, Urho3D::ResourceRouter, Urho3D::Script, Urho3D::ScriptEventInvoker, Urho3D::Serializable, Urho3D::ShaderPrecache, Urho3D::Time, Urho3D::UI, Urho3D::VertexBuffer, Urho3D::View, Urho3D::Viewport, and Urho3D::WorkQueue.

const String & GetCategory () const
 Return object category. Categories are (optionally) registered along with the object factory. Return an empty string if the object category is not registered.

 RefCounted ()
 Construct. Allocate the reference count structure and set an initial self weak reference.
 
virtual ~RefCounted ()
 Destruct. Mark as expired and also delete the reference count structure if no outside weak references exist.
 
void AddRef ()
 Increment reference count. Can also be called outside of a SharedPtr for traditional reference counting.
 
void ReleaseRef ()
 Decrement reference count and delete self if no more references. Can also be called outside of a SharedPtr for traditional reference counting.

 Return reference count.

Detailed Description

Base class for objects with type identification, subsystem access and event sending/receiving capability.
